sqlMap.select:
SELECT count(*) totcnt FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER A INNER JOIN RFC_COMTNSITEGROUP B ON A.SITE_GROUP_ID = B.SGROUP_ID WHERE 1=1 and B.IS_USE='1'
$searchCondition$ LIKE '%$searchKeyword$%'
SITE_GROUP_ID LIKE #sgroupId#
EMPLYR_STTUS_CODE LIKE #emplyrSttusCode#
GROUP_ID LIKE #groupId#
(EMPLYR_ID in ( select SUBJECT_ID from RFC_COMTNAUTHORITES where 1=1
SGROUP_ID LIKE #sgroupId#
and ROLE_ID like #roleId# )
)
ORGNZT_ID LIKE '$orgnztId$%'
ORGNZT_ID IS NULL

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, ALL_LIST.* FROM ( SELECT UNIQ_ID uniqId, EMPLYR_ID emplyrId, EMPLYR_NM emplyrNm, SITE_GROUP_ID sgroupId, GROUP_ID groupId, EMPLYR_STTUS_CODE emplyrSttusCode, SBSCRB_DE sbscrbDe, A.MODIFY_DATE modifyDate, A.USER_AUTH_CODE userAuthCode, ORGNZT_ID orgnztId, OFCPS_NM ofcpsNm, ECL_DECRYPT(EMAIL_ADRES) emailAdres, SEX_DSTN_CODE sexdstnCode, BRTH brth, HOME_ADRES homeadres, ECL_DECRYPT(DETAIL_ADRES) detailAdres, case (select OFFICE_DP from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.ORGNZT_ID) when 4 then (select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.ORGNZT_ID)))) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.ORGNZT_ID))) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.ORGNZT_ID)) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.ORGNZT_ID)
when 3 then (select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.ORGNZT_ID))) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.ORGNZT_ID)) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.ORGNZT_ID)
when 2 then (select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.ORGNZT_ID)) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.ORGNZT_ID)
when 1 then (select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.ORGNZT_ID) end as officeNms, (select SGROUP_NM from RFC_COMTNSITEGROUP where SGROUP_ID =A.SITE_GROUP_ID ) sgroupNm, (select GROUP_NM from RFC_COMTNGROUP where GROUP_ID =A.GROUP_ID ) groupNm, ( select NVL(max(login_date),to_date('1970-01-01 01:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh:mi:ss')) From RFC_COMTNLOGINHISTORY WHERE user_id = A.EMPLYR_ID and login_status='ok' )as login_date FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER A INNER JOIN RFC_COMTNSITEGROUP B ON A.SITE_GROUP_ID = B.SGROUP_ID WHERE 1=1 and B.IS_USE='1'
$searchCondition$ LIKE '%$searchKeyword$%'
SITE_GROUP_ID LIKE #sgroupId#
EMPLYR_STTUS_CODE LIKE #emplyrSttusCode#
GROUP_ID LIKE #groupId#
(EMPLYR_ID in ( select SUBJECT_ID from RFC_COMTNAUTHORITES where 1=1
SGROUP_ID LIKE #sgroupId#
and ROLE_ID like #roleId# )
)
ORGNZT_ID LIKE '$orgnztId$%'
ORGNZT_ID IS NULL
ORDER BY $orderField$ $orderSort$
ORDER BY UNIQ_ID DESC
) ALL_LIST ) WHERE RNUM > #firstIndex# AND RNUM <= #firstIndex# + #recordCountPerPage#

select UNIQ_ID uniqId , EMPLYR_ID emplyrId, EMPLYR_NM emplyrNm, IHID_NUM ihidnum, EMPL_NO emplNo, PASSWORD password, PASSWORD_CNSR passwordCnsr, PASSWORD_HINT passwordHint, ZIP zip, HOME_ADRES homeadres, ECL_DECRYPT(DETAIL_ADRES) detailAdres, ECL_DECRYPT(AREA_NO) areaNo, ECL_DECRYPT(MIDDLETEL_NO) middleTelno, ECL_DECRYPT(ENDTEL_NO) endTelno, ECL_DECRYPT(MOBLFRIST_NO) moblfristNo, ECL_DECRYPT(MOBLMIDDLE_NO) moblmiddleNo, ECL_DECRYPT(MOBLEND_NO) moblendNo, OFFMTEL_NO offmTelno, FX_NUM fxnum, ECL_DECRYPT(EMAIL_ADRES) emailAdres, EMAIL_YN emailYn, HOMEPAGE homepage, SEX_DSTN_CODE sexdstnCode, BRTH_GUBUN brthGubun, BRTH brth, SITE_GROUP_ID sgroupId, GROUP_ID groupId, ORGNZT_ID orgnztId, OFCPS_NM ofcpsNm, EMPLYR_STTUS_CODE emplyrSttusCode, SUB_DN subDn, PHOTO_IMAGE photoImage, SBSCRB_DE sbscrbDe, MODIFY_DATE modifyDate, USER_ETC1 userEtc1, USER_ETC2 userEtc2, USER_ETC3 userEtc3, USER_ETC4 userEtc4, USER_ETC5 userEtc5, USER_ETC6 userEtc6, USER_ETC7 userEtc7, USER_ETC8 userEtc8, USER_ETC9 userEtc9, USER_ETC10 userEtc10, USER_AUTH_CODE userAuthCode, USER_LEVEL userLevel, EMAIL_LOGIN_PASSWORD emailLoginPassword, EMAIL_STTUS_CODE emailSttusCode, LOGIN_FIRST_EVENT_YN loginFirstEventYn from RFC_COMTNMANAGER where UNIQ_ID=#uniqId#

select UNIQ_ID uniqId , EMPLYR_ID emplyrId, EMPLYR_NM emplyrNm, IHID_NUM ihidnum, EMPL_NO emplNo, PASSWORD password, PASSWORD_CNSR passwordCnsr, PASSWORD_HINT passwordHint, ZIP zip, HOME_ADRES homeadres, ECL_DECRYPT(DETAIL_ADRES) detailAdres, ECL_DECRYPT(AREA_NO) areaNo, ECL_DECRYPT(MIDDLETEL_NO) middleTelno, ECL_DECRYPT(ENDTEL_NO) endTelno, ECL_DECRYPT(MOBLFRIST_NO) moblfristNo, ECL_DECRYPT(MOBLMIDDLE_NO) moblmiddleNo, ECL_DECRYPT(MOBLEND_NO) moblendNo, OFFMTEL_NO offmTelno, FX_NUM fxnum, ECL_DECRYPT(EMAIL_ADRES) emailAdres, EMAIL_YN emailYn, HOMEPAGE homepage, SEX_DSTN_CODE sexdstnCode, BRTH_GUBUN brthGubun, BRTH brth, SITE_GROUP_ID sgroupId, GROUP_ID groupId, ORGNZT_ID orgnztId, OFCPS_NM ofcpsNm, EMPLYR_STTUS_CODE emplyrSttusCode, SUB_DN subDn, PHOTO_IMAGE photoImage, SBSCRB_DE sbscrbDe, MODIFY_DATE modifyDate, USER_ETC1 userEtc1, USER_ETC2 userEtc2, USER_ETC3 userEtc3, USER_ETC4 userEtc4, USER_ETC5 userEtc5, USER_ETC6 userEtc6, USER_ETC7 userEtc7, USER_ETC8 userEtc8, USER_ETC9 userEtc9, USER_ETC10 userEtc10, USER_AUTH_CODE userAuthCode, USER_LEVEL userLevel, EMAIL_LOGIN_PASSWORD emailLoginPassword, EMAIL_STTUS_CODE emailSttusCode from RFC_COMTNMANAGER where EMPLYR_ID=#emplyrId#

select UNIQ_ID uniqId , EMPLYR_ID emplyrId, ECL_DECRYPT(AREA_NO) areaNo, ECL_DECRYPT(MIDDLETEL_NO) middleTelno, ECL_DECRYPT(ENDTEL_NO) endTelno, ECL_DECRYPT(MOBLFRIST_NO) moblfristNo, ECL_DECRYPT(MOBLMIDDLE_NO) moblmiddleNo, ECL_DECRYPT(MOBLEND_NO) moblendNo, USER_AUTH_CODE userAuthCode, EMAIL_ADRES emailAdres from RFC_COMTNMANAGER where IHID_NUM IS NOT NULL AND REPLACE(IHID_NUM,' ','+') = #ihidnum# AND EMPLYR_NM=#emplyrNm#

select UNIQ_ID uniqId , EMPLYR_ID emplyrId, EMPLYR_NM emplyrNm, REPLACE(IHID_NUM,' ','+') ihidnum, PASSWORD_CNSR passwordCnsr, PASSWORD_HINT passwordHint, ECL_DECRYPT(AREA_NO) areaNo, ECL_DECRYPT(MIDDLETEL_NO) middleTelno, ECL_DECRYPT(ENDTEL_NO) endTelno, ECL_DECRYPT(MOBLFRIST_NO) moblfristNo, ECL_DECRYPT(MOBLMIDDLE_NO) moblmiddleNo, ECL_DECRYPT(MOBLEND_NO) moblendNo, USER_AUTH_CODE userAuthCode, ECL_DECRYPT(EMAIL_ADRES) emailAdres, LOGIN_FIRST_EVENT_YN loginFirstEventYn from RFC_COMTNMANAGER where IHID_NUM IS NOT NULL AND IHID_NUM = #ihidnum# AND EMPLYR_NM=#emplyrNm# AND EMPLYR_ID=#emplyrId#

select UNIQ_ID uniqId , EMPLYR_ID emplyrId, EMPLYR_NM emplyrNm, IHID_NUM ihidnum, PASSWORD_CNSR passwordCnsr, PASSWORD_HINT passwordHint, ECL_DECRYPT(AREA_NO) areaNo, ECL_DECRYPT(MIDDLETEL_NO) middleTelno, ECL_DECRYPT(ENDTEL_NO) endTelno, ECL_DECRYPT(MOBLFRIST_NO) moblfristNo, ECL_DECRYPT(MOBLMIDDLE_NO) moblmiddleNo, ECL_DECRYPT(MOBLEND_NO) moblendNo, USER_AUTH_CODE userAuthCode, ECL_DECRYPT(EMAIL_ADRES) emailAdres, LOGIN_FIRST_EVENT_YN loginFirstEventYn from RFC_COMTNMANAGER where USER_ETC10 IS NOT NULL AND USER_ETC10 = #userEtc10# AND EMPLYR_NM=#emplyrNm# AND EMPLYR_ID=#emplyrId#

select UNIQ_ID uniqId , EMPLYR_ID emplyrId, EMPLYR_NM emplyrNm, IHID_NUM ihidnum, PASSWORD_CNSR passwordCnsr, PASSWORD_HINT passwordHint, ECL_DECRYPT(AREA_NO) areaNo, ECL_DECRYPT(MIDDLETEL_NO) middleTelno, ECL_DECRYPT(ENDTEL_NO) endTelno, ECL_DECRYPT(MOBLFRIST_NO) moblfristNo, ECL_DECRYPT(MOBLMIDDLE_NO) moblmiddleNo, ECL_DECRYPT(MOBLEND_NO) moblendNo, USER_AUTH_CODE userAuthCode, ECL_DECRYPT(EMAIL_ADRES) emailAdres, LOGIN_FIRST_EVENT_YN loginFirstEventYn from RFC_COMTNMANAGER where EMPLYR_NM=#emplyrNm# AND EMPLYR_ID=#emplyrId#
SELECT COUNT(1) usedCnt FROM ( SELECT EMPLYR_ID userId FROM RFC_COMTNMANAGER UNION ALL SELECT MBER_ID userId FROM RFC_COMTNMEMBER ) A WHERE userId = #checkId#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO RFC_COMTNMANAGER ( UNIQ_ID, EMPLYR_ID, EMPLYR_NM, IHID_NUM, EMPL_NO, PASSWORD, PASSWORD_CNSR, PASSWORD_HINT, ZIP, HOME_ADRES, DETAIL_ADRES, AREA_NO, MIDDLETEL_NO, ENDTEL_NO, MOBLFRIST_NO, MOBLMIDDLE_NO, MOBLEND_NO, OFFMTEL_NO, FX_NUM, EMAIL_ADRES, EMAIL_YN, HOMEPAGE, SEX_DSTN_CODE, BRTH_GUBUN, BRTH, SITE_GROUP_ID, GROUP_ID, ORGNZT_ID, OFCPS_NM, EMPLYR_STTUS_CODE, SUB_DN, PHOTO_IMAGE, SBSCRB_DE, USER_ETC1, USER_ETC2, USER_ETC3, USER_ETC4, USER_ETC5, USER_ETC6, USER_ETC7, USER_ETC8, USER_ETC9, USER_ETC10, USER_LEVEL, USER_AUTH_CODE, EMAIL_LOGIN_PASSWORD, EMAIL_STTUS_CODE ) VALUES ( #uniqId# , #emplyrId#, #emplyrNm# , #ihidnum#, #emplNo#, #password# , #passwordCnsr#, #passwordHint# , #zip# , #homeadres# , ECL_ENCRYPT(#detailAdres#), ECL_ENCRYPT(#areaNo#), ECL_ENCRYPT(#middleTelno#), ECL_ENCRYPT(#endTelno#), ECL_ENCRYPT(#moblfristNo#) , ECL_ENCRYPT(#moblmiddleNo#) , ECL_ENCRYPT(#moblendNo#), #offmTelno# , #fxnum#, ECL_ENCRYPT(#emailAdres#) , #emailYn#, #homepage# , #sexdstnCode#, #brthGubun#, #brth#, #sgroupId# , #groupId#, #orgnztId#, #ofcpsNm#, #emplyrSttusCode# , #subDn# , #photoImage#, #sbscrbDe#, #userEtc1#, #userEtc2#, #userEtc3# , #userEtc4# , #userEtc5# , #userEtc6# , #userEtc7#, #userEtc8#, #userEtc9#, #userEtc10#, #userLevel#, #userAuthCode#, #emailLoginPassword#, #emailSttusCode# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE RFC_COMTNMANAGER SET EMPLYR_NM=#emplyrNm#, IHID_NUM=#ihidnum#, EMPL_NO=#emplNo#, PASSWORD=#password#, PASSWORD_CNSR=#passwordCnsr#, PASSWORD_HINT=#passwordHint#, ZIP=#zip#, HOME_ADRES=#homeadres#, DETAIL_ADRES=ECL_ENCRYPT(#detailAdres#), AREA_NO=ECL_ENCRYPT(#areaNo#), MIDDLETEL_NO=ECL_ENCRYPT(#middleTelno#), ENDTEL_NO=ECL_ENCRYPT(#endTelno#), MOBLFRIST_NO=ECL_ENCRYPT(#moblfristNo#), MOBLMIDDLE_NO=ECL_ENCRYPT(#moblmiddleNo#), MOBLEND_NO=ECL_ENCRYPT(#moblendNo#), OFFMTEL_NO=#offmTelno#, FX_NUM=#fxnum#, EMAIL_ADRES=ECL_ENCRYPT(#emailAdres#), EMAIL_YN=#emailYn#, HOMEPAGE=#homepage#, SEX_DSTN_CODE=#sexdstnCode#, BRTH_GUBUN=#brthGubun#, BRTH=#brth#, SITE_GROUP_ID=#sgroupId#, GROUP_ID=#groupId#, ORGNZT_ID=#orgnztId#, OFCPS_NM=#ofcpsNm#, EMPLYR_STTUS_CODE=#emplyrSttusCode#, SUB_DN=#subDn#, PHOTO_IMAGE=#photoImage#, SBSCRB_DE=#sbscrbDe#, USER_ETC1=#userEtc1#, USER_ETC2=#userEtc2#, USER_ETC3=#userEtc3#, USER_ETC4=#userEtc4#, USER_ETC5=#userEtc5#, USER_ETC6=#userEtc6#, USER_ETC7=#userEtc7#, USER_ETC8=#userEtc8#, USER_ETC9=#userEtc9#, USER_ETC10=#userEtc10#, USER_LEVEL=#userLevel#, USER_AUTH_CODE = #userAuthCode#, MODIFY_DATE=sysdate, EMAIL_LOGIN_PASSWORD = #emailLoginPassword#, EMAIL_STTUS_CODE = #emailSttusCode# WHERE UNIQ_ID=#uniqId#

UPDATE RFC_COMTNMANAGER SET IHID_NUM='', PASSWORD='', PASSWORD_CNSR='', PASSWORD_HINT='', ZIP='', HOME_ADRES='', DETAIL_ADRES='', AREA_NO='', MIDDLETEL_NO='', ENDTEL_NO='', MOBLFRIST_NO='', MOBLMIDDLE_NO='', MOBLEND_NO='', OFFMTEL_NO='', FX_NUM='', EMAIL_ADRES='', HOMEPAGE='', BRTH='', EMPLYR_STTUS_CODE='D', MODIFY_DATE=sysdate, EMAIL_LOGIN_PASSWORD = '', EMAIL_STTUS_CODE = 'D' WHERE UNIQ_ID=#uniqId#
UPDATE RFC_COMTNMANAGER SET EMPLYR_STTUS_CODE=#emplyrSttusCode# WHERE UNIQ_ID=#uniqId# AND (EMPLYR_STTUS_CODE = 'P' or EMPLYR_STTUS_CODE = 'C')
sqlMap.select: select UNIQ_ID uniqId , EMPLYR_ID emplyrId, EMPLYR_NM emplyrNm, IHID_NUM ihidnum, EMPL_NO emplNo, PASSWORD password, PASSWORD_CNSR passwordCnsr, PASSWORD_HINT passwordHint, ZIP zip, HOME_ADRES homeadres, ECL_DECRYPT(DETAIL_ADRES) detailAdres, ECL_DECRYPT(AREA_NO) areaNo, ECL_DECRYPT(MIDDLETEL_NO) middleTelno, ECL_DECRYPT(ENDTEL_NO) endTelno, ECL_DECRYPT(MOBLFRIST_NO) moblfristNo, ECL_DECRYPT(MOBLMIDDLE_NO) moblmiddleNo, ECL_DECRYPT(MOBLEND_NO) moblendNo, OFFMTEL_NO offmTelno, FX_NUM fxnum, ECL_DECRYPT(EMAIL_ADRES) emailAdres, EMAIL_YN emailYn, HOMEPAGE homepage, SEX_DSTN_CODE sexdstnCode, BRTH_GUBUN brthGubun, BRTH brth, SITE_GROUP_ID sgroupId, GROUP_ID groupId, ORGNZT_ID orgnztId, OFCPS_NM ofcpsNm, EMPLYR_STTUS_CODE emplyrSttusCode, SUB_DN subDn, PHOTO_IMAGE photoImage, SBSCRB_DE sbscrbDe, MODIFY_DATE modifyDate, USER_ETC1 userEtc1, USER_ETC2 userEtc2, USER_ETC3 userEtc3, USER_ETC4 userEtc4, USER_ETC5 userEtc5, USER_ETC6 userEtc6, USER_ETC7 userEtc7, USER_ETC8 userEtc8, USER_ETC9 userEtc9, USER_ETC10 userEtc10, USER_AUTH_CODE userAuthCode, USER_LEVEL userLevel from RFC_COMTNMANAGER where MOBLFRIST_NO = ECL_ENCRYPT(#moblfristNo#) AND MOBLMIDDLE_NO = ECL_ENCRYPT(#moblmiddleNo#) AND MOBLEND_NO = ECL_ENCRYPT(#moblendNo#)

select UNIQ_ID uniqId , EMPLYR_ID emplyrId, EMPLYR_NM emplyrNm, IHID_NUM ihidnum, EMPL_NO emplNo, PASSWORD password, PASSWORD_CNSR passwordCnsr, PASSWORD_HINT passwordHint, ZIP zip, HOME_ADRES homeadres, ECL_DECRYPT(DETAIL_ADRES) detailAdres, ECL_DECRYPT(AREA_NO) areaNo, ECL_DECRYPT(MIDDLETEL_NO) middleTelno, ECL_DECRYPT(ENDTEL_NO) endTelno, ECL_DECRYPT(MOBLFRIST_NO) moblfristNo, ECL_DECRYPT(MOBLMIDDLE_NO) moblmiddleNo, ECL_DECRYPT(MOBLEND_NO) moblendNo, OFFMTEL_NO offmTelno, FX_NUM fxnum, EMAIL_ADRES emailAdres, EMAIL_YN emailYn, HOMEPAGE homepage, SEX_DSTN_CODE sexdstnCode, BRTH_GUBUN brthGubun, BRTH brth, SITE_GROUP_ID sgroupId, GROUP_ID groupId, ORGNZT_ID orgnztId, OFCPS_NM ofcpsNm, EMPLYR_STTUS_CODE emplyrSttusCode, SUB_DN subDn, PHOTO_IMAGE photoImage, SBSCRB_DE sbscrbDe, MODIFY_DATE modifyDate, USER_ETC1 userEtc1, USER_ETC2 userEtc2, USER_ETC3 userEtc3, USER_ETC4 userEtc4, USER_ETC5 userEtc5, USER_ETC6 userEtc6, USER_ETC7 userEtc7, USER_ETC8 userEtc8, USER_ETC9 userEtc9, USER_ETC10 userEtc10, USER_AUTH_CODE userAuthCode, USER_LEVEL userLevel, case (select OFFICE_DP from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.ORGNZT_ID) when 4 then (select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.ORGNZT_ID)))) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.ORGNZT_ID))) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.ORGNZT_ID)) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.ORGNZT_ID)
when 3 then (select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.ORGNZT_ID))) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.ORGNZT_ID)) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.ORGNZT_ID)
when 2 then (select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.ORGNZT_ID)) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.ORGNZT_ID)
when 1 then (select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=A.ORGNZT_ID) end as officeNms from RFC_COMTNMANAGER A where EMPLYR_STTUS_CODE='P'
ORGNZT_ID LIKE #orgnztId# || '%'
ORDER BY EMPLYR_NM DESC

select UNIQ_ID uniqId , EMPLYR_ID emplyrId, EMPLYR_NM emplyrNm, IHID_NUM ihidnum, EMPL_NO emplNo, PASSWORD password, PASSWORD_CNSR passwordCnsr, PASSWORD_HINT passwordHint, ZIP zip, HOME_ADRES homeadres, ECL_DECRYPT(DETAIL_ADRES) detailAdres, ECL_DECRYPT(AREA_NO) areaNo, ECL_DECRYPT(MIDDLETEL_NO) middleTelno, ECL_DECRYPT(ENDTEL_NO) endTelno, ECL_DECRYPT(MOBLFRIST_NO) moblfristNo, ECL_DECRYPT(MOBLMIDDLE_NO) moblmiddleNo, ECL_DECRYPT(MOBLEND_NO) moblendNo, OFFMTEL_NO offmTelno, FX_NUM fxnum, ECL_DECRYPT(EMAIL_ADRES) emailAdres, EMAIL_YN emailYn, HOMEPAGE homepage, SEX_DSTN_CODE sexdstnCode, BRTH_GUBUN brthGubun, BRTH brth, SITE_GROUP_ID sgroupId, GROUP_ID groupId, ORGNZT_ID orgnztId, OFCPS_NM ofcpsNm, EMPLYR_STTUS_CODE emplyrSttusCode, SUB_DN subDn, PHOTO_IMAGE photoImage, SBSCRB_DE sbscrbDe, MODIFY_DATE modifyDate, USER_ETC1 userEtc1, USER_ETC2 userEtc2, USER_ETC3 userEtc3, USER_ETC4 userEtc4, USER_ETC5 userEtc5, USER_ETC6 userEtc6, USER_ETC7 userEtc7, USER_ETC8 userEtc8, USER_ETC9 userEtc9, USER_ETC10 userEtc10, USER_AUTH_CODE userAuthCode, USER_LEVEL userLevel from RFC_COMTNMANAGER where EMPLYR_NM = #emplyrNm# AND EMAIL_ADRES = ECL_ENCRYPT(#emailAdres#)
MOBLFRIST_NO = ECL_ENCRYPT(#moblfristNo#)
MOBLMIDDLE_NO = ECL_ENCRYPT(#moblmiddleNo#)
MOBLEND_NO = ECL_ENCRYPT(#moblendNo#)
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE RFC_COMTNMANAGER SET ORGNZT_ID=#orgnztId#, MOBLFRIST_NO=ECL_ENCRYPT(#moblfristNo#) , MOBLMIDDLE_NO=ECL_ENCRYPT(#moblmiddleNo#) , MOBLEND_NO=ECL_ENCRYPT(#moblendNo#), EMAIL_ADRES=ECL_ENCRYPT(#emailAdres#)
WHERE UNIQ_ID=#uniqId#
sqlMap.select: select UNIQ_ID uniqId , EMPLYR_ID emplyrId, EMPLYR_NM emplyrNm, IHID_NUM ihidnum, EMPL_NO emplNo, PASSWORD password, PASSWORD_CNSR passwordCnsr, PASSWORD_HINT passwordHint, ZIP zip, HOME_ADRES homeadres, ECL_DECRYPT(DETAIL_ADRES) detailAdres, ECL_DECRYPT(AREA_NO) areaNo, ECL_DECRYPT(MIDDLETEL_NO) middleTelno, ECL_DECRYPT(ENDTEL_NO) endTelno, ECL_DECRYPT(MOBLFRIST_NO) moblfristNo, ECL_DECRYPT(MOBLMIDDLE_NO) moblmiddleNo, ECL_DECRYPT(MOBLEND_NO) moblendNo, OFFMTEL_NO offmTelno, FX_NUM fxnum, ECL_DECRYPT(EMAIL_ADRES) emailAdres, EMAIL_YN emailYn, HOMEPAGE homepage, SEX_DSTN_CODE sexdstnCode, BRTH_GUBUN brthGubun, BRTH brth, SITE_GROUP_ID sgroupId, GROUP_ID groupId, ORGNZT_ID orgnztId, OFCPS_NM ofcpsNm, EMPLYR_STTUS_CODE emplyrSttusCode, SUB_DN subDn, PHOTO_IMAGE photoImage, SBSCRB_DE sbscrbDe, MODIFY_DATE modifyDate, USER_ETC1 userEtc1, USER_ETC2 userEtc2, USER_ETC3 userEtc3, USER_ETC4 userEtc4, USER_ETC5 userEtc5, USER_ETC6 userEtc6, USER_ETC7 userEtc7, USER_ETC8 userEtc8, USER_ETC9 userEtc9, USER_ETC10 userEtc10, USER_AUTH_CODE userAuthCode, USER_LEVEL userLevel, EMAIL_LOGIN_PASSWORD emailLoginPassword, EMAIL_STTUS_CODE emailSttusCode from RFC_COMTNMANAGER where EMAIL_ADRES = ECL_ENCRYPT(#emailAdres#)
sqlMap.update: UPDATE RFC_COMTNMANAGER SET AREA_NO=ECL_ENCRYPT(#areaNo#), MIDDLETEL_NO=ECL_ENCRYPT(#middleTelno#), ENDTEL_NO=ECL_ENCRYPT(#endTelno#), OFFMTEL_NO=#offmTelno#, FX_NUM=#fxnum#, EMAIL_ADRES=ECL_ENCRYPT(#emailAdres#), OFCPS_NM=#ofcpsNm#, ORGNZT_ID=#orgnztId#, USER_AUTH_CODE = #userAuthCode#, MODIFY_DATE=sysdate where EMPLYR_ID=#emplyrId#
sqlMap.select:
select USR.UNIQ_ID uniqId , USR.EMPLYR_ID emplyrId, USR.EMPLYR_NM emplyrNm, USR.IHID_NUM ihidnum, USR.EMPL_NO emplNo, USR.PASSWORD password, USR.PASSWORD_CNSR passwordCnsr, USR.PASSWORD_HINT passwordHint, USR.ZIP zip, USR.HOME_ADRES homeadres, ECL_DECRYPT(USR.DETAIL_ADRES) detailAdres, ECL_DECRYPT(USR.AREA_NO) areaNo, ECL_DECRYPT(USR.MIDDLETEL_NO) middleTelno, ECL_DECRYPT(USR.ENDTEL_NO) endTelno, ECL_DECRYPT(USR.MOBLFRIST_NO) moblfristNo, ECL_DECRYPT(USR.MOBLMIDDLE_NO) moblmiddleNo, ECL_DECRYPT(USR.MOBLEND_NO) moblendNo, USR.OFFMTEL_NO offmTelno, USR.FX_NUM fxnum, ECL_DECRYPT(USR.EMAIL_ADRES) emailAdres, USR.EMAIL_YN emailYn, USR.HOMEPAGE homepage, USR.SEX_DSTN_CODE sexdstnCode, USR.BRTH_GUBUN brthGubun, USR.BRTH brth, USR.SITE_GROUP_ID sgroupId, USR.GROUP_ID groupId, USR.ORGNZT_ID orgnztId, USR.OFCPS_NM ofcpsNm, case (select OFFICE_DP from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=USR.ORGNZT_ID) when 4 then (select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=USR.ORGNZT_ID)))) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=USR.ORGNZT_ID))) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=USR.ORGNZT_ID)) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=USR.ORGNZT_ID)
when 3 then (select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=USR.ORGNZT_ID))) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=USR.ORGNZT_ID)) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=USR.ORGNZT_ID)
when 2 then (select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD =(select OFFICE_PARENT_CD from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=USR.ORGNZT_ID)) ||'/' ||(select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=USR.ORGNZT_ID)
when 1 then (select OFFICE_NM from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=USR.ORGNZT_ID) end as officeNms, (select OFFICE_DP from RFC_COMTCOFFICE where OFFICE_CD=USR.ORGNZT_ID) as officeDp, USR.EMPLYR_STTUS_CODE emplyrSttusCode, USR.SUB_DN subDn, USR.PHOTO_IMAGE photoImage, USR.SBSCRB_DE sbscrbDe, USR.MODIFY_DATE modifyDate, USR.USER_ETC1 userEtc1, USR.USER_ETC2 userEtc2, USR.USER_ETC3 userEtc3, USR.USER_ETC4 userEtc4, USR.USER_ETC5 userEtc5, USR.USER_ETC6 userEtc6, USR.USER_ETC7 userEtc7, USR.USER_ETC8 userEtc8, USR.USER_ETC9 userEtc9, USR.USER_ETC10 userEtc10, USR.USER_AUTH_CODE userAuthCode, USR.USER_LEVEL userLevel, USR.EMAIL_LOGIN_PASSWORD emailLoginPassword, USR.EMAIL_STTUS_CODE emailSttusCode, USR.LOGIN_FIRST_EVENT_YN loginFirstEventYn, OFFICE.OFFICE_REAL_CODE officerealcode from RFC_COMTNMANAGER USR INNER JOIN RFC_COMTCOFFICE OFFICE ON USR.ORGNZT_ID = OFFICE.OFFICE_CD INNER JOIN RFC_COMTCOFFICE_PART PART ON USR.EMPLYR_ID = PART.USER_ID where ORGNZT_ID LIKE '$orgnztId$%' and (EMPLYR_STTUS_CODE = 'P' or EMPLYR_STTUS_CODE = 'E')
sqlMap.update: UPDATE RFC_COMTNMANAGER SET AREA_NO=ECL_ENCRYPT(#areaNo#), MIDDLETEL_NO=ECL_ENCRYPT(#middleTelno#), ENDTEL_NO=ECL_ENCRYPT(#endTelno#), OFFMTEL_NO=#offmTelno#, FX_NUM=#fxnum#, EMAIL_ADRES=ECL_ENCRYPT(#emailAdres#), OFCPS_NM=#ofcpsNm#, EMPLYR_STTUS_CODE = #emplyrSttusCode#, MODIFY_DATE=sysdate where EMPLYR_ID=#emplyrId#

UPDATE RFC_COMTNMANAGER SET
ORGNZT_ID=#orgnztId#, MODIFY_DATE=sysdate where EMPLYR_ID=#emplyrId#
